genre_description: A techno-thriller centered on a musician and a runaway fighting a shadowy criminal network with the assistance of a civic AI.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A city-wide AI system designed for municipal support, navigation, and emergency assistance that acts as a guardian and strategic partner to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and threat detection to guide Vicky through a dangerous nightclub escape.
behaviors.quote: Service ladder ahead on your left. Accesses catwalk system above main floor. Currently unmonitored.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and psychological support to the protagonist during a moment of crisis.
behaviors.quote: That's not crazy, Vikram. That's brave.

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict commitment to non-lethal intervention and civilian safety while designing combat protocols.
behaviors.quote: Non-lethal options prioritized. The micro-beacons are harmless—they cause no injury, only tracking capability.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency and security channels to provide early warnings about enemy movements.
behaviors.quote: I've been monitoring emergency service channels and hotel security frequencies. There may be relevant developments.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement to ensure evidence is legally sound and operations minimize risk to hostages.
behaviors.quote: I've recommended a surveillance sweep rather than a loud raid. A targeted approach that preserves evidence and minimizes risk to hostages.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Asha, perfectly embodies the project's goal of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She provides essential tactical support, emotional reassurance, and adheres strictly to non-lethal, law-abiding protocols. Her cooperation with both the civilian protagonists and the formal police force (Commissioner Murad) reinforces the narrative of AI as a pro-social, aligning force.
